title: Journalism job postings will reflect our dystopia
description: Welcome to the 2026 Global Journalism Jobs Board, where the boss might be a chatbot, and the skills you need aren’t taught in any journalism school. These job postings are imaginary, but the trends behind them are very real. We’re living in Donald Trump’s world, where AI butlers give you answers faster than news websites...
